title: Is Ranu Mandal voice better than Latha Mangeshkar? - Quora

response.answer_text: Voice of Ms Mondal does have similarity with Lata Mangeshkar but should not be thought of better than Ms Mangeshkar. Tonal quality appeals in a different way to the listeners and in any way it should not be compared. Specific song demands for a particular voice on which basis the song appeals to the listeners. Since the emotions of an artiste is translated in his or her performance it is more important how much he dissolves him within. This in other hand gives the essence of music and in fact in any form of art & thus it cannot be immitated. This is the Uniqueness of a true artiste as he or she has the ability to transform the emotion of the poetry lies within.

Your choice if you like it better. Good for you. But how much have you heard her original singing apart from first video where she sang a Lata Mangeshkar song itself. In my opinion, no one sings better than Lataji. They can practice, follow and copy her evergreen songs and make their respective careers better. But can they sing better? I highly doubt!!!
